message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE

This paper deals with natural language processing and machine learning techniques for relation extraction, which are commonly studied in the sub-fields of computational linguistics (cs.CL), information retrieval (cs.IR), and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE). The focus on pattern-based methods and the use of morpho-syntactical annotations suggest a stronger connection to cs.CL, but the potential application of the proposed boosting method to any pattern-based relation extraction method could also make it relevant to cs.IR and cs.LG.
